text: Mikhail Vasilyevich Ignatyev (, Mihal Vaślin yvӑl Jӑkӑnatjev; ) (8 January 1962 – 18 June 2020) was a Chuvash politician. In 2010, he became the Head of the Chuvash Republic. On 29 January 2020, Russian President Vladimir Putin fired Ignatyev and replaced him with Oleg Nikolayev as acting head. Ignatyev died on 18 June 2020 after being hospitalized with COVID-19 in Saint Petersburg, Russia, aged 58. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Russia Category:Russian politicians Category:Chuvash Republic
title: Mikhail Ignatyev (politician)
